title: Life Lessons (Tale Art)
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]



[[image https://lounge.hexick.com/uploads/97a4606e0f8faaaa/image.png]]

> Tie-in art for the wonderful, heart-wrenching tale [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/life-lessons-or-you-aren-t-getting-younger-every-day Life Lessons, or You Aren't Getting Younger Every Day] by [[*user subtletea]]. 
> 
> What an absolutely crushing story. Every opportunity it has, it takes. Please go read it. For now, I hope you like the art!   
> And of course, my dumb boring author page is here [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/dr-vikki-lost if you want to meet me outside your window at 3 am tonight, holding the weapon that brings your demise to reality!] 
>  
> And as always - thanks. Have a wonderful day.
author: Dr Vikki Lost
